name: Flower Shop Big City Break Lite
name_original: Flower Shop Big City Break Lite
description:
Can you help Meg turn a small flower shop into a blooming success? You'll need to keep the customers happy, the flowers blossoming and the money rolling in. Sound easy? Then see how many demanding customers you can serve at once!

Upgrade to the full version of Flower Shop Big City Break and help expand Meg’s business by playing over sixty action packed levels in four glamorous locations.
